website_summaries.verdict: A well-cushioned trainer for the overpronating runner.
pros: Features a highly cushioned midsole that provides a stable ride
Midsole materials are also incredibly durable and the forefoot is nice and wide
Reviewers felt the shoe provided adequate arch support, too
cons: Some felt the shoe lacked support

customer_reviews.title: It is not like I am abusing these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I received these sneakers on June 23rd 2017, here it is August 16, 2017, the top of the shoe where the mesh is, is already breaking down, right shoe there is a small hole coming near the toe of the shoe. Left shoe has a small hole coming in the small mesh insert on the side. I am a 62 year old women. It is not like I am abusing these sneakers. For $154.05, I excepted a better sneaker. After all it is a New Balance sneaker. Won't ever buy this sneaker again. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Just when I thought that the New Balance 990 version 3 couldn't be improved upon...enter the New Balance 990 version 4! Yes, the 990 is better than ever with this latest version 4. The toe box is slightly roomier with the width, heel and arch support remaining with the same great version 3 fit, and additional padding has been added...all of which add up to New Balance taking the best features of their version 3 and making small improvements that make a big difference for their best 990 version ever, and it is still made in the USA...YAY! I highly recommend the New Balance 990 version 4!!!
customer_reviews.author: Duke Blue Devil

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed with this new version
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and for years Ive relied on the new balance w990v3 shoe to help alleviate the pain for me. This new upgrade is more narrow and the arch is higher which is enough to have me looking into other shoes. I am disappointed with this new version.
customer_reviews.author: amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 5th pair of New Balance 990's. I have balance issues and I haven't fallen since I started wearing these shoes. Their newest version '4' is amazing. The quality of these shoes gets better with each version. The attention to detail is amazing. I buy a new pair every Christmas and rotate the old pair to my 'work' shoes. I started with version 2. They are a bit pricey but well worth it. I'm retired and I wear them every day so I was ok with the price. If you feel your feet and balance are important, this is the shoe for you! Excellent quality, made in America, arrived on time in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Years ago a podiatrist recommended these shoes for my very flat feet
customer_reviews.text: Years ago a podiatrist recommended these shoes for my very flat feet. Since then, they are the only shoes I wear for walking and exercise and I just reorder them online. I do change the insoles for orthotic ones made by Powerstep, that have a better heel cup. This has prevented a recurrence of plantar faciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Joemama

customer_reviews.title: Will still need specialized insoles for foot problems
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! These are wonderful quality as shown by the cost. I have plantar fasciitis and was recommended these by my podiatrist. If you have any foot problems you will still need to purchase specialized insoles (I have pronation and high arches). Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Selleck

customer_reviews.title: Love New Balance 990's
customer_reviews.text: The color of the pigskin is actually a bit more military green than the picture shows it to be. This is perfect! New Balance 990's are my personal favorite shoe, I have 5 pair of the V4 and 9 pair of the previous version V3's. They give me stability, they are comfortable, they fit my foot perfectly. They are very well made and last for years, my first pair is over 5 years old and still looks and feels new. We all have different feet and different needs for those feet, for my feet, I could not ask for a better shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I have severe tendonitis on my instep and have difficulty finding shoes that provide enough support so that my foot does not pronate. These are perfect! I waited a few months to get them because they're a bit expensive. Foolishly, I purchased two other pairs of sneakers that together totaled less than what these cost, but I should just have gotten these from the start. They're worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Annie from Queens

customer_reviews.title: First 990 fail!
customer_reviews.text: I wear nothing but new balance 990. Ive worn this style for 12 years. There is something wrong with this pair. The toe box has small defect that rubs big toe. Can’t wear them. Ive tried different socks and it makes no difference. I do not recommend this shoe
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. Oestreich

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tennis wrong price!!!😡
customer_reviews.text: I love the tennis and they look beautiful...I looked at these for a long time because they are expensive....$175.00....I have a major problem with the fact I now see them available in my size for the low price of $86.95 or whatever the exact price...I feel I got ripped off ..with tax that's ($187.00) a difference of almost $100.00 I need a refund or something ...that's ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: GAIL A TURNQUEST

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but seams defective?
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort of these shoes. But the coral lining just looks horrible like its defective. Does anyone else have this issue? For 160.00 I would think they would close up the seam to make it nicer looking. Maybe it's only this pair? Please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Molotky

customer_reviews.title: I love New Balance shoes and haven't bought any other brand ...
customer_reviews.text: I love New Balance shoes and haven't bought any other brand for ages. However, I'm having trouble homing in on the proper size. I sense a slight variation from one product to another. I hope the pair I've just ordered will fit. In addition to being too large, the 990v4 shoes I received were angora and gold. I couldn't determine from the website at the time of order that part of the trim was gold. Between wrong size and gold trim, I returned them. I'll keep trying until I find a pair of NB's that work for me. Betty p.s. My last 2 pairs of New Balance running shoes have been superb and have outlasted any other brands in durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: May not be real deal.
customer_reviews.text: I have been a New Balance customer for many years. I do not believe these were actual NB product. Flimsy, different font logos and put up against the original shoes just are not the same. Perhaps I’m mistaken but Buyer beware. I returned and do want to thank Amazon for immediate refund.
customer_reviews.author: BELINDA BROIDO

customer_reviews.title: There’s a lot of room for my toes & it feels like walking on air
customer_reviews.text: Earlier I bought 2 NB 990V4 in size 8D. I had to return both pairs & bought the 2E width. The 2E width fits just perfectly with my orthotics installed. There’s a lot of room for my toes & it feels like walking on air. I have been using New Balance shoes for the past 5 years & has helped tremendously with my pronation & other foot problems. I have recommended NB shoes to all my friends & it has helped improve their foot problems also. Another plus is NB shoes are all made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a super comfortable shoe that didn't scream I am an American ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair,of,these locally for me and I was so impressed that I purchased another pair for my spouse here on Amazon. I wanted a super comfortable shoe that didn't scream I am an American while traveling abroad. White athletic shoes or sandals lol give you away, and in some places you want to look like a local. These shoes do it perfectly. Only downside is that they run hotter than the white.
customer_reviews.author: Professor H

customer_reviews.title: To tight, rubs small
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, but they do not fit like the ones I bought at new balance store. Bought same style number, size.... tags same, but to tight.
customer_reviews.author: gagirl

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these on Wednesday and they were delivered Friday! Colors are as pictured. They are a little heavier than what I am used to. I have flat feet and plantar fasciitis and these shoes give my feet and ankles good support. I also had to put my orthotics inside which made a difference too.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Size is accurate
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 8 1/2 and it fit perfectly. There was one small hiccup in the beginning. The back of the right shoe was rubbing a little on the back of my ankle but after I wore them in it stopped. All in all it was worth buying. They are very comfortable and they dont hurt my feet. I did expect a bigger arch in the shoe since I had surgery three times on my feet and my doctor said I have to have arches in my shoes or my feet will hurt me. These shoes dont hurt me. Love them so much. Thank you New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comes in a wide range of sizes, and made in the USA.
customer_reviews.text: If you have unusual-shaped feet, say very wide at the toes, it is very hard to find athletic shoes that fit. These come in the greatest range of sizes of any brand or style that I have found. So, both I and spouse were able to find shoes that fit comfortably. A bonus is that they are made in the USA. They hold up about as well as any athletic shoe with molded soles. You should plan on replacing them every few years. If you don't use them enough to wear the soles out, the glue and/or rubber will break down and the soles will start to separate.
customer_reviews.author: Syauchen C. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for knee and back pain
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd and 3rd pair of New Balance 990v4. I have a bad ankle, 2 bad knees and a bad back. This shoe truly help with all the pain! Update: this last time I purchased 2 one black one CastleRock(grey). I just started wearing the grey pair and they fit REALLY different than the black pair. I thought maybe they just needed to be broken in a little but so far nothing changed. I kind of wish I could return them. They make my feet hurt! And I have verified the size everything is exactly the same. The only difference is the color and the discomfort 😔
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE RUNNING SHOES!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite model running shoe - I have them in navy, gray, and will soon be purchasing them in black. If they bring some more colors, I'll order those, as well! Very comfortable, supportive running shoes. I wear them with my orthotic, as the footbed is plenty deep enough to accommodate it. The toe is wide on these shoes, which is something I love. These are truly the SL-2 last, which is somewhat difficult to find. Love these running shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Annie dusty

customer_reviews.title: good for metatarsalgia but not for arches
customer_reviews.text: So as a pro, they are very comfortable and true to size. It did make working on my feet, walking on concrete all day much bearable for the padding on the balls of my feet. However, they don't have arch support. So it's like sacrificing one comfort for the other with these shoes. They have worked the best over any Dr, Scholls work or gel inserts though, but for I would suggest inserts the "Spenco Polysorb Cross Trainer Athletic Cushioning Arch Support Shoe Insoles". If you don't need the arch support, then these shoes will be great for you.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe for plantar fasciitis! Great support,comfortable from day one, ..second pair I have owned,I will continue to purchase in the future. Love the berry color for fall, winter.
customer_reviews.author: Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits great! I love New Balance and am very pleased with this purchase. I will buy form this vendor again. I wear a size 10 medium women's shoe. 145 lbs. I have a very high arch and need solid arch support. This shoe has great support but is very lightweight and so comfortable. It is like walking on a cloud. I have narrow heels and a wider forefoot. The shoe hugs my heel providing support around my ankles and the toe box is just right. The shoe quality is excellent and the packaging was well done. Very happy. I will buy another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: JamieG

customer_reviews.title: New Balance 990v4 Running Shoes Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Due to foot problems, I've been wearing New Balance 993 shoes for years. When new pains developed, research showed that the 990 line was rated highly for those of us with difficult-to-fit feet. Unfortunately, this was not true for me. Although I ordered the women's D width, shoes still feel tight, making pain worse after a short time. The padding around the ankles feels too high and rubs. Because I wore them outside, I cannot return them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara F.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, but not comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe. Just too wide. I work for Amazon, and I work 10-11 hour shifts- so my feet need a lot of support. Unfortunately, these shoes gave me absolutely no support for my feet. Within 4 hours of my shift, my feet start to hurt. Love the shoes to wear everyday, but not for work. I do not recommend these if you work and stand on your feet for long hours. Please aim for a shoe that gives your heel and arch more support. This shoe doesn't look flat, but it is. Otherwise, these are cute with a pair of skinny jeans or leggings!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Mae

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: My medical provider said that I should wear this specific brand and type at work to reduce stress on my back. I work in an elder care setting with lots of walking. Excellent advice. Pricey on my budget but so is a copay at a doctor's office. No sciatica flare-ups since I started wearing this shoe. Mint green gets me compliments as does the military green shoe, which looks more brown on Amazon. It's actually Army green. Worth the price for me to get two pairs. I find myself smiling more because my back doesn't hurt!
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Hulbert

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous color
customer_reviews.text: After 2 foot surgeries I can not wear regular shoes. The NB 990 was recommended with a special instep and a custom heal wedge. Only made in gray and black was getting pretty boring. I stumbled on these beautiful berry colored ones and it was a miracle that they were in my size. They are beautiful and very dressy for sneakers. I feel blessed to have found them.
customer_reviews.author: FARILYN BUCHMAN

customer_reviews.title: New Balance delivers another great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Top-notch quality, great comfortable fit, and good-looking. I tend to pronate, so this shoe is ideal for me for running. I expect it will last a long time, just as my New Balance 609s and 857s did over the years. I will not wear any other brand. Botach Tactical, on the other hand, the seller, is inflexible. Soon after receiving my shoes, Amazon prompted me to review this product, and when I did, I saw it was discounted $20. Botach would not budge, no price adjustment, nothing. Buyer beware. Botach Tactical does not cater to the customer. Great shoe, bad seller.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Tonogbanua

customer_reviews.title: ... a New Balance fan for many years due to superior fit, quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been a New Balance fan for many years due to superior fit, quality, and its made in the USA. I have no arch, very narrow heels and arthritis. I have custom orthotics. This the only brand that does not hurt my heels, does not blister or cause any kind of discomfort from the first wear. I have 3 pairs of running shoes, in 3 different states of condition, and 1 pair of boots in the boot tray in the mud room right now. Excellent quality, arrived on time in new condition.
customer_reviews.author: stablemistress

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size sent - Wrong Size identified above - Returning
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing NB identified above for years, but first time I ordered online. I ordered a 7.5 medium width. Order confirmation just stated the shoe size but no width and I didn't think anything of it. However, shoe was tight and when I clicked on return, it showed that I had been sent a 7.5 N. Now I see, that I am being asked to rate a 7.5 W - as to features - sad to say, sorry can't do except to say that it looked exactly like the one I have bought in a store and that the fit has always been perfect when it is the correct size!
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the shoe is not consistent!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this shoe. I ordered in Navy blue also and that shoe is very comfortable but the Black appears not to be the same shoe. I think it is poorly made. It would make me very hesitant to order it again. I would be concerned that the quality of the shoe is not consistent.
customer_reviews.author: virginia l palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Pricey!
customer_reviews.text: Had to step up the size and width for my left foot which has a bunion (fortunately they had this womens size). Thus the right shoe is a little large. (so I just wear two socks on right foot) very comfortable, good for walking standing.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Neubauer

customer_reviews.title: Only tennis shoe I can wear
customer_reviews.text: I am a man that has to order and wear a women's shoe because all the shoe makers, including New Balance, doesn't make shoes for my foot width. I don't have a hugemongus wide foot as most men, I wear a 2A in the width. But to get that width and the length I need, I have to order a 13 2A in a woman's shoe. Talk about limited. Glad there are some women with good sized feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mert

customer_reviews.title: Heel Problem
customer_reviews.text: I have had NB shoes before and this 990v5 was the closest to being like my old tennis shoes. The shoes fit fairly well...except for a problem with the heel. The back of the shoe is slightly higher than my old pair. However, something is going on with the heel. The shoe rubbed against the back of my heel and I developed bursitis (pump bump). I can no longer wear these shoes. Doctor recommended I not wear them. I am back to wearing my old pair as I am treating the bursitis. It developed after wearing the shoes for my 3 miles walks after about 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: meemaw1952

customer_reviews.title: Hard as Hell inside!
customer_reviews.text: Outer part of the shoe is great. Fit is great outer shoe....but the whole inner insole is not the same as the Old New Balance. This is so hard I have foot pain...don't buy this shoe even if it's a freebie!
customer_reviews.author: Dot Frank

customer_reviews.title: Womens New Balance 990v4
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing the 990 for years and find the design perfect for my feet. I wear them on a daily basis, and not for athletic activities. The v4 has a newly designed tongue that I don't find as comfortable as the shorter tongue of the v3; not only is it longer, but the lip is straight and not curved. This new design rubs the front of my ankle. I bought the grey 990v4 because I needed new shoes, but hope that NB will make the shoe in white and some contrasting color.
customer_reviews.author: CTD

customer_reviews.title: The best all around shoe I have ever worn,
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this 990 series of shoes since 2006 after being fit in a local New Balance Store. I originally purchased these shoes to wear to the gym (I am not a runner). I have wide feet with hereditary tendency to bunions and wear these shoes with custom orthotic inserts which fit perfectly. Love them so much that I keep extra a pairs to wear outside of gym almost all the time. I love that they are made in the USA and thrilled that these shoes are still being made after all these years. The best all around shoe I have ever worn!
customer_reviews.author: Janson

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 8 or 81/2. In this shoe I needed the 81/2. The shoe was recommended by my podiatrist. Due to an injury I've been in a medical boot for 8 weeks and have graduated to these shoes. They are good alone but I added a very thin gel insole. I recommend this shoe for good support.
customer_reviews.author: Pat NY

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I have purchased this exact show - I wear it all the time! I have a high toe box so most tennis shoes hit the top of my toes - this shoe gives me enough room in the toe box without being in any way sloppy. It fits great and is very supportive.
customer_reviews.author: candice m akizuki

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for stability
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these!!! I have flat feet and have to buy very supportive shoes that provide a lot of stability when I walk. I live on a gravel road with large rocks and walking on the rocky ground can really make my ankles wobble causing injuries. These have been perfect for keeping my feet stable. For the past 15 years I have worn only New Balance tenny shoes because of their quality and craftsmanship. In addition to the quality of these shoes I liked that they were my favorite color...navy blue.
customer_reviews.author: bn

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of the 990 and my feet refuse to wear anything else.
customer_reviews.author: jliz

customer_reviews.title: 990v4 New Balance womens
customer_reviews.text: Great price and best supportive sneaker. Had several foot surgeries and had trouble finding sneaker that helped with the pain. went to a new balance store and tried these and after a month of using them, no more pain. this is the only model I will buy. very supportive, last about 6 months. A bit expensive but due to no more foot pain, worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Donny from RI

customer_reviews.title: Size 11 shoes in a size 12 box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes in February of 2020. They are my favorite athletic shoes. I wanted to have a pair on hand and the price was great. I wore them for the first time today (mid July 2020). They felt snug but I figured that was because they were new. I went for an 8 mile walk and came home with very sore feet. I checked inside the tongue and found that they were size 11 instead of the size 12 that the box said they were - and that I had ordered. Now what?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've been "recovering" from an ankle sprain for over a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been "recovering" from an ankle sprain for over a year now, and these are the only shoes that don't irritate my foot. I'm finally able to take long walks and exercise again. They are true-to-size, snug around the ankles, and have a LOT of padding in the sole. I've been living in them for about 6 months and they're holding up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Good looking made in USA shoes
customer_reviews.text: I had some New Balance made in USA shoes that I'd had for years that didn't really have a ton of mileage on them, but I felt they looked dated, so I ordered these gray ones. The gray color is nice, and the fit is good. I've worn them about 10 times and am happy with them, although I might get some replacement laces some day because the ones they came with are rather plain.
customer_reviews.author: Jeep2000

customer_reviews.title: My knees were hurting so bad I felt i had no choice but to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought these because I researched and came to the conclusion I had outward pronation of my foot. My knees were hurting so bad I felt i had no choice but to buy them! I am SO glad that I did! I have been walking and walking and no knee pain! Thank you for making these I absolutely need and love them!
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Great Support for Sore Feet
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes for my sore feet. I have tried other NB shoes but found this design to give the best support for sore heels and arches. I walk at least three miles a day and these shoes have helped make that possible. I highly recommend this style and brand.
customer_reviews.author: S M

customer_reviews.title: Finally; A perfectly made sneaker, in every aspect!
customer_reviews.text: Very cushioned, great arch support, plenty of room in the toe box. There is just enough height to take any strain off of your back. I wear them 12 hours a day and they’re still comfortable when I get ready for my pajamas. I bought another pair in navy. My 1st pair are grey. If they came in more colors, I’d buy more. Best sneakers I’ve ever owned. Don’t ever discontinue this model.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: I got these for my plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended for my plantar fasciitis at the New Balance store. These were on sale on Amazon, much cheaper than at the New Balance store. I wanted to make sure I liked them before spending full price. I love them! The olive green is a nice neutral color that I'm able to wear to work every day. Plus, I ordered Tread Lab inserts. The shoes with the inserts are like walking on clouds. My feet feel fantastic! My feet feel wonderful all day!
customer_reviews.author: TinTN

customer_reviews.title: best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: best shoes ever. not necessarily the most stylish but much cuter than other really wide shoes. i have bunions and capsulitis and old stress metatarsal fractures. paired with superfeet inserts these shoes offer great support with minimal bend in sole. the 2e wide width leave tons of room in the toe box. worn at work with cargo pants and at home with straight leg jeans. do not look cute with skinny jeans or capris because they are just to chunky.
customer_reviews.author: erin75

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable and stable fitting running shoe
customer_reviews.text: New Balance 990 is the best athletic shoe for me, as it runs true to width. It is so very hard for people with narrow width feet to find shoes in which your feet don’t feel unstable or like they’re swimming! Hope New Balance will offer a truly narrow Width walking or tennis shoe. And keep making the 990!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great price for an expensive shoe
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE NB 990 series. I have high arches, and a knee that I have had surgery on twice. This is the only style/brand of shoe that keeps me active and pain free. Retail is over $150.00 for this series. I usually purchase these shoes every 6-9 months due to constant wear. Is mint my first choice of color? Nope. Will I wear the heck out of these because they are over $100 off retail? Yeppers.
customer_reviews.author: Arwynn

customer_reviews.title: Fine for walks & work, but not for long runs.
customer_reviews.text: I use to run w/ NB 990s long time ago, but I wanted to try other shoes that were more breathable & lighter. I live in Hawaii, suede isn't the best in warm weather. After wearing more mesh like sneakers, it's really hard to even jog w/ NB. I can really feel its weight/warmth, in comparison, to my Nikes, Hokas & Asics. 8oz vs. 10oz makes a difference over time, esp on your ligaments/tendons, & when you exercise in warm weather, your feet swell. I have wide feet & bunions, so I'm pretty picky w/ running shoes, so I can't say the 990s would be my top pick. I've reserved 990s only for work or simple walks, that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Rewa

customer_reviews.title: This is an AMAZING shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING shoe..great arch support, suggest to get 1/2 size bigger to allow for room if you wear socks..toe box roomy..just a great comfy shoe. I've tried many man other brands but New Balance really it the mark with the V4 in the 990 series. TheV3 wasuncomfortable and the tongue of the shoe kept slipping to the side..which irritated outside of my little toe. Do buy the V4 version of this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jazzeoneaj

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They definitely took some time to break them in, especially the tongue of the shoe. That hurt for a while until they were broken in. I love the color and they were for breast cancer awareness. So, they served two great purposes, one for breast cancer awareness and two ro help with bodily support.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R.

customer_reviews.title: Sole separation.
customer_reviews.text: Sole had a separation on one shoe on the inner part of the foot. Kinda disappointed that for how much I paid, my shoes seem to be rejects being sold for full price. I love NB and have worn them for years. First time I have gotten a flawed shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Borel

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: The New Balance shoes I got is perfection. I have a chronic lower back pain and recently experienced an excruciating pinch nerve. My cousin highly recommended to get the New Balance 990. When you’re in pain yo want to try anything and I’m so glad I followed her advise. Went on a trip to Texas, did a lot of walking with my New Balance 990 without a single complaint. I wear this to work too, since I do a lot of stairs climbing and walking at my work place. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nina S

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Unlike all other New Balance products that I have used in the past, these shoes were very badly made. There were holes in the tongue. The tongue was raggedy and raveling. I returned this pair of shoes as fast as possible. I was disappointed. For over $175.00 I expected something better than what appeared to be seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than ussual
customer_reviews.text: too wide and too big , they missed up this order... i always wear NB, so im very familiar with the size, but this one, is completely out of range. At least two sizes bigger,,, dont understand..,
customer_reviews.author: Rokaye

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear this brand and style of sneakers for years and then they became hard to find in the local sneaker stores. While these were expensive, they are still cheaper than what I used to pay for them at the store. Fit great and have good support. I wear them for my walking exercise. I think they would be a good sneaker for running too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Maran

customer_reviews.title: Shoe good, shoelaces not so much
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe that lives up to it's reviews. I ordered a half-size larger to accommodate custom othotics. However, for an athletic shoe at this price point, the laces were poor. They are flat instead of slightly rounded so they don't move smoothly, making it hard to tighten the laces before tying. Problem easily solved with a $2.50 pair of Kiwi laces from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: happycamper45

customer_reviews.title: Slightly used but good look & fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and fit, but I had to put my custom orthopedic inserts and they make a squeaky sound they don't make with my other shoes. They also had some blue dye on the inside I found strange and some fur under the inserts that came with the shoe. They had to have been used because they weren't in the original box either. I really like the shoe otherwise but will think twice on my next order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An excellent shoe with great stability
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of New Balance 990v4. The shoe works very well for me, providing good stability and accommodating my custom orthotics. The quality is excellent and the shoes are quite durable. They were recommended by my pedorthist to effectively help correct my balance problems. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Norfleete Day

customer_reviews.title: excellent supportive well made woman's shoe in a lot of sizes and colors
customer_reviews.text: This is the only shoe I can wear. I have degenerative arthriis my spine and knees are very damaged. This shoe supports and holds my feet while being extremely comfortable. Larger sizes I am a 11 and a half regular have few choices of colors. I was very happy to get Susan G Coman pink. Everyone I meet loves the color.exce
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe for wide womens feet
customer_reviews.text: This shoe model is the only women's model I've been able to wear for hiking. Otherwise I have to buy mens shoes. The toe box fits my wide feet plus I have a slight bunion on one side. Very comfortable and supportive. I use this shoe for everyday as well, and it is very comfortable. A bit pricey, but worth it. I also use a semi-custom insert from Lucky Shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Support & Fit
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd pair of W990V4 Running Shoes: IF only I ran...I suffer from plantar fasciitis and this shoe hugs my narrow heel perfectly. I own the grey/pink W990V4s but needed new ones. Bought another New Balance style but ended up returning them & purchasing these. I wasn't sure about the color but I do think they are summery looking. I wore them the 1st day and no problems since...considering the pink ones too!
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Bolt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoes - Never Received Shipment Notifications
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this show matches my old ones exactly. I love the shoes. BEWARE - I never received any notifications that my order shipped at all - very atypical for Amazon/Amazon vendor purchases. Other than the lack of shipment information, I am very pleased with the actual shoes.
customer_reviews.author: mickey

customer_reviews.title: NewBalance is the best
customer_reviews.text: I tried another brand after being a loyal New Balance customer and that was a big mistake. I had to purchase what i know works and that is this new balance shoe. It is comfortable and provide lots of support while running. I will not try other brands. I have been purchasing new balance for over 10 years and they DON'T disappoint
customer_reviews.author: A. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfy shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing the 990v4 for a couple years now for my walking shoe. Very comfortable, but order half size bigger. When I saw this color (the original is silvery grey) I just had to have it, though it is quite a bit more expensive. This will be a casual shoe, not for exercise so it stays clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jkl

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes I’ve ever had. Really good support for my weak ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A Richards

customer_reviews.title: I have to use Super Feet orthotics in them for longer lasting support
customer_reviews.text: I have to use Super Feet orthotics in them for longer lasting support. NB needs to make the sole of the shoe more durable and long lasting. I go through these really fast. Having foot problems and such it is very hard finding anything with long lasting support and stability past 180 days. Then they get donated,
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Support, aesthetics, fit in one package. Rare!
customer_reviews.text: Second pair this model. First pair still like new. This pair fit better with my custom orthotics. Went down a half size. Without orthotics, the top of the heel, or counter, hits my ankle bone.. not good as I have a plate and 17 screws in my ankle including the ankle bone. Still testing them, trust will be as happy with them as so many others are.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Brundige

customer_reviews.title: Podiatrist Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was recommended by my podiatrist - who was wearing this shoe. It meets his standards for support. I have plantar fasciitis and walking is extremely painful. These shoes help. They also were true to size. I want to get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne G.

customer_reviews.title: New Balance 990 is a good exercise shoe!
customer_reviews.text: They came in a timely manner. They fit well and seem to wear well. The last pair I had lasted a little over 3 years. I walk every day and occasionally hike in them. Am hopeful this pair will last as long as the other pair did.
customer_reviews.author: sewingsue

customer_reviews.title: Purchase of NB 990v4 shoes
customer_reviews.text: Because I have worn this shoe in the past, the shoes ordered on Amazon were almost identical to those I already had which were purchased at the NB Store near me. I like the shoe and the discount on Amazon though the shoes purchased at the NB Store are sturdier and crafted better than the shoes I recently purchased on Amazon. The shoes from Amazon are lighter and crafted differently than the NB Store shoes. I will see if they hold up as well as the NB Store shoes have. I like that the shoes are of a lighter weight than the first pair I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren White

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: While the shoe is well made. I have other NB sneakers, the laces thT came with these shoes are the old type ,flat ,white cotton laces. If you lace the shoe up , the laces are too short. I had taken a pair of old ,round grey laces from one of my other NB sneakers which fit much better, are longer and coordinate better.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Support
customer_reviews.text: I wear with my custom orthotics. No break in period needed. I wear at work and i am on my feet for the entire shift except for lunch. I can always rely on New Balance for the foot support.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Miller

customer_reviews.title: Order one half size larger
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I ordered were too short. My toes hit the end of the shoes. I ordered one half size up and they fit perfectly. They are so cushiony and so very confortsble. I love them. Just order a little larger than what you normally wear. I received the pair I ordered to replace the too small pair and I love them. I could have worn the width on the other pair but the length was way too short. I highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I tried to find another shoe that would fit the same and not cost quite so much. But for me, this is the one in 7W. The toe box is roomy, it is actually a wide shoe at the point where the ball of my foot is widest, and the arch support is good for someone prone to plantar faschiitis . Expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle S.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THEM!!!! I had a pair of new balance for almost 9yrs, wore those till the soles wore off. Bought these & they are even more comfortable. I am in the medical field & these are the most comfortable shoes for what I do for 10-12 hrs a day. ❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not the New Balance I currently have.,
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the wide width was too tight . They have changed the 900 series smaller and less side even with the wide width. So disappointed. I could always depend on the New. Alan Rosenberg for my problem not now. And they are very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: V. sharma

customer_reviews.title: but they are much better made, have much better fabric in them
customer_reviews.text: This one is made in the USA. They cost a lot more than those assembled here, but they are much better made, have much better fabric in them. I ordered one of each, and sent the assembled one back the next day. I didn't even try it on after looking at the seams and feeling the weight. It just wasn't a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: It was worth the extra money -
customer_reviews.text: I really had to just let go and spend whatever it took to get the highest quality NB's I could. Yeah, these are the real New Balance shoes, and they are top of the line. The soles are what NB's all used to be - all the workmanship is there.
customer_reviews.author: Paliskate

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe in years
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe I've bought in many years. I researched shoes that would help relieve the pain of my plantar faciitis/heel spur and within 2 days I was able to walk MUCH more easily. The support from these shoes is what I USED to find in shoes but has been missing for the past 3 decades. The cost wasn't really any higher than any other atheltic shoe in this category..and worth every cent tp me and my feet ! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amozon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love love love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet and this is the only sport shoe that fits. They are comfortable and we'll balanced. I don't run but I do live in them year around and do a lot of walking and some hiking. I have tried other brands but always come back to New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to find extra wide shoes/sneakers so when I do I usually buy them. I love New Balance! This is the 3rd pair I’ve purchased. They are very comfortable and I can be on my feet for hours in them. These are a little stiff I think because of the material so unlike the other pairs I own these will need a little breaking in before I can wear them for hours comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Putterman

customer_reviews.title: NB Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Although I can no longer do running (except on the tennis court) I like these shoes for walking my dogs in the park. They fit very well and help me with the stress of my knees. I've had two knee replacements that did great. These shoes continue to help keep any added stress off my knees. Very good, comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Jones

customer_reviews.title: Surefooted. Keeps ankle and knee in alignment.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair. Easy to order correct size since I have had same model in the past. Can't seem to find tennis shoes comparable to these. Removable inserts allow me to replace with my personal orthotics. Quality product. So glad I could find this model on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: June E.

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair at Happy Feet. Saw these online and decided to try. They fit perfect! I need a wide shoe that is comfortable to wear 10 hrs a day at work. (Hospital). This is the shoe!
customer_reviews.author: lisa nilsson

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of Plantar Fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Love my New Balance sneakers. I have very flat feet. In addition, I had plantar fasciitis, and after cortisone shots, physical therapy and a lot of money wasted, I bought these as a last resort. Wish I had known about them sooner! My heels were pain free within 2 weeks time. I only bought NB from then on! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: alissa pepe

customer_reviews.title: Just not right for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this model shoe for 20 years. But this particular pair was not good. It hurt my back my feet the tongue came up way too high. I loved the color but that was about it. Really sorry that I had to return them
customer_reviews.author: funtimes

customer_reviews.title: Nice color scheme and nice looking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These tennis shoes are really nice looking but a little stiffer fit for me and not true to size. I really like them but the size I needed was an available which was actually a size down than what I normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: amazonreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!  Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to find a women's 11.5 Wide width shoe and this fits great. Most have a toe box that is too narrow. I prefer a shoe with better support, but can add an insert when needed.
customer_reviews.author: bookreader 442

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought 2 pairs at the time
customer_reviews.text: These are great running shoes. I got sidelined with a torn meniscus but am back on board. I wore this pair out since I wore them so much but wont part with them as they are still the most comfortable shoes. I tried to reorder but not available any longer
customer_reviews.author: Mare Bare

customer_reviews.title: Whoever sent these was sloppy and sent a pair that evidently had been returned.
customer_reviews.text: Received the sneakers in a broken box with rubber bands holding it closed, no tissue paper, no stuffing to keep the shape of the sneakers and some scuffing on their side. These fit me well, I like the color, but for $119 I'd like a new pair! I always wear this sneaker and am very comfortable in them.
customer_reviews.author: Phyl

customer_reviews.title: I got these in Narrow but they don't fit as ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these in Narrow but they don't fit as narrow as other NB I have had in the past. They looked really "clunky" somewhat cheap. Since they were were over $150 I returned them. For that price they should fit and look good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Support not quite as good as previous pair of same model
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of the w990v4 about a year ago and they were hands down the best athletic shoe i've ever worn. While good, this new pair doesn't have the same great fit. I can't really put my finger on the problem. For me, it's just "different", not in a good way. Even wearing with my orthotics, the cushioning doesn't seem as good. For the price, I expect better.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy N

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Shoes are pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. They look just like the photo and they are very supportive. Only one came laced in the box (seemed strange) and I don't like that the back of the shoe seems high and hits me a little above the area that would be comfy, but they are good shoes. I wear them to the gym and they seem great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gurl75

customer_reviews.title: The tongue tore out after 2 months use
customer_reviews.text: They fit nice, but after 2 months of use the tongue TORE RIGHT OUT of the shoe. The stitching attaching the tongue just completely let go. Considering I spent almost $175... I AM T.I.C.K.E.D!!! to put it politely...
customer_reviews.author: Johansen

product_meta.title: New Balance Women's Made in Us 990 V4 Sneaker
feature_bullets: Made in the USA and Imported
Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
ENCAP PU ring with EVA core midsole
